author: Fabiano Maisonnave
description: Brazil’s former president, Jair Bolsonaro, underwent a medical procedure on Saturday afternoon at a hospital in Brasília to treat a bout of persistent hiccups.
title: Bolsonaro Undergoes Medical Procedure to Treat Severe Hiccups

author: Daryna Krasnolutska
description: Russian forces hit Ukraine’s capital with a massive airstrike on the eve of talks between Volodymyr Zelenskiy and Donald Trump to discuss a plan to end Moscow’s war.
title: Kyiv Hit by Russian Barrage a Day Before Zelenskiy-Trump Meeting

author: Patpicha Tanakasempipat, Randy Thanthong-Knight
description: Thailand and Cambodia agreed to an immediate ceasefire, reaching such an agreement for the second time in six months after the latest round of border clashes killed dozens of soldiers and civilians.
title: Thailand, Cambodia Declare Ceasefire After Weeks of Fighting

description: "Bloomberg Markets" follows the market moves across every global asset class and discusses the biggest issues for Wall Street. Today's guests: Tortoise Capital Senior Portfolio Manager Rob Thummel, SW Retail Advisors President & Founder Stacey Widlitz, The Conference Board Chief Economist Dana Peterson, Crescent Grove Advisors CO-CIO Andrew Krei, Morgan Stanley Private Wealth Advisor Kathy Entwistle, Wedbush Securities Equity Research Senior Vice President Alicia Reese, Seaport Research Partners Senior Analyst, Semiconductor, Electronics Jay Goldberg, Laffer Investments CEO and CIO Nancy Tengler, BMO Private Wealth Chief Market Strategist Carol Schleif, Wedbush Securities Technology Research Global Head Daniel Ives, Reserve Padel Founder and CEO Wayne Boich and La Fete Wine Company Founder and CEO Donae Burston. (Source: Bloomberg)
title: Bloomberg Markets: Late Edition 12/26/2025

author: Patrick Gillespie
description: Argentina’s Senate approved President Javier Milei’s budget bill for 2026, cementing a legislative victory that overcame renewed tensions between the libertarian leader and his top ally.
title: Milei Wins Argentina Budget Approval Despite Tensions With Macri
